keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The dwindling number of Americans playing abroad has been a source of fret, but some have taken solid first steps up the European ladder.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Men Seep Back Overseas for Soccer
headline.main: New Wave of American Soccer Players in Europe Bucks a Trend

snippet: The dwindling number of Americans playing abroad has been a source of fret, but some have taken solid first steps up the European ladder....
abstract: Several of promising young members of United States men's national soccer team are playing professionally in Europe, reversing recent trend of top players returning home for Major League Soccer clubs; shift encourages those convinced that facing tougher competition abroad ends up benefiting national team overall.
